summary: In 2017, the government began implementing the Technology Business Management framework to help federal agencies better manage their IT resources. This framework includes a standard set of categories that agencies are required to use in their annual IT budget requests. These categories group related IT expenses together, which could provide greater insight into the costs and values of IT resources. It could also enable government-wide...
title: Technology Business Management: OMB and GSA Need to Strengthen Efforts to Lead Federal Adoption
